data.title: International Junior Masters
data.text:
International Junior Masters Application

2024 Boys Application

Complete the following as accurately as possible. This application is the only information used to extend invitations. This is NOT an invitation to compete.

"*" indicates required fields

Player

Name*

First Last

Your Location*

City / Hometown State / Province / Region ZIP / Postal Code Country

Parent's Email*

Parent's Phone*

High School Graduation Year*

High School Name*

How did you hear about the International Junior Masters?*

I played last year

A friend played

Local junior golf organization

From a PGA professional

Saw an advertisement

Other

Would you require housing?*

Yes

No

In order to help us plan our housing needs...if you are invited to compete; will you be requesting private housing with a host family? (We don't gurantee that there will be housing for all interested participants. It is on a first come, first serve basis)

Why do you want to play?*

Briefly tell us why you want to play in the International Junior Masters

Golf Resume

Handicap Index*

Performance in National/International Tournaments

Please list the date, size of field, your finish and round-by-round total. Example: 06/28/19, "name of tournament", 1st of 75, 71-75-67-67= 280

Performance in State/Regional Tournaments

Please list the date, size of field, your finish and round-by-round total. Example: 06/28/19, "name of tournament", 1st of 75, 71-75-67-67= 280

Performance in Local/High School Tournaments

Please list the date, size of field, your finish and round-by-round total. Example: 06/28/19, "name of tournament", 1st of 75, 71-75-67-67= 280

Other Athletic Awards/Recognition

(i.e. All-State, Medalist, M.V.P.)

Invitations will be extended throughout the spring with final invitations no later than the beginning of May. Return your application as soon as possible in order for the committee to give your credentials proper consideration. We accept a field of 72 boys and 12 girls.

Email

This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
